text: Filippo Spitoni (born 17 April 1984 in Fabriano) is an Italian professional footballer who currently plays as a goalkeeper for AC Pavia.Filippo Spitoni - Carriera - Tuttocalciatori.net ==Notes== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Vis Pesaro dal 1898 players Category:S.S.
